title: The Gourmet Dilemma
description: A man tries to order food at a restaurant, but the conversation takes some unexpected twists.

conversations.name: Waitress
conversations.contentEnglish: Good evening, sir. Would you like to start with something to drink?
conversations.contentSpanish: Buenas noches, señor. ¿Le gustaría empezar con algo para beber?
conversations.contentItalian: Buonasera signore. Vorrebbe iniziare con qualcosa da bere?
conversations.contentFrench: Bonsoir monsieur. Souhaitez-vous commencer par quelque chose à boire?

conversations.name: Man
conversations.contentEnglish: Hmm, do you serve organic, gluten-free water?
conversations.contentSpanish: Hmm, ¿sirven agua orgánica sin gluten?
conversations.contentItalian: Hmm, avete acqua organica senza glutine?
conversations.contentFrench: Hmm, servez-vous de l'eau biologique sans gluten?

conversations.name: Waitress
conversations.contentEnglish: Uh, water is naturally gluten-free, sir.
conversations.contentSpanish: Eh, el agua es naturalmente sin gluten, señor.
conversations.contentItalian: Eh, l'acqua è naturalmente senza glutine, signore.
conversations.contentFrench: Euh, l'eau est naturellement sans gluten, monsieur.

conversations.name: Man
conversations.contentEnglish: Excellent! I'll take a glass of that exquisite water.
conversations.contentSpanish: ¡Excelente! Tomaré un vaso de esa agua exquisita.
conversations.contentItalian: Eccellente! Prenderò un bicchiere di quell'acqua squisita.
conversations.contentFrench: Excellent ! Je prendrai un verre de cette eau exquise.

conversations.name: Waitress
conversations.contentEnglish: Very well. Are you ready to order food?
conversations.contentSpanish: Muy bien. ¿Está listo para ordenar comida?
conversations.contentItalian: Molto bene. È pronto per ordinare del cibo?
conversations.contentFrench: Très bien. Êtes-vous prêt à commander à manger?

conversations.name: Man
conversations.contentEnglish: Yes, can I have a vegan steak?
conversations.contentSpanish: Sí, ¿puedo tener un bistec vegano?
conversations.contentItalian: Sì, posso avere una bistecca vegana?
conversations.contentFrench: Oui, puis-je avoir un steak végétalien?

conversations.name: Waitress
conversations.contentEnglish: I'm afraid we only serve real steak, sir.
conversations.contentSpanish: Me temo que solo servimos bistec real, señor.
conversations.contentItalian: Temo che serviamo solo bistecche vere, signore.
conversations.contentFrench: J'ai bien peur que nous ne servions que de vrais steaks, monsieur.

conversations.name: Man
conversations.contentEnglish: Ah, too bad. Alright, I'll go for the chicken parmesan then.
conversations.contentSpanish: Ah, qué mal. De acuerdo, entonces tomaré el pollo a la parmesana.
conversations.contentItalian: Ah, peccato. Va bene, allora prendo il pollo alla parmigiana.
conversations.contentFrench: Ah, dommage. D'accord, je prendrai le poulet parmesan alors.

conversations.name: Waitress
conversations.contentEnglish: Would you like that cooked, or should I just bring out a chicken and some cheese?
conversations.contentSpanish: ¿Le gustaría eso cocido, o debo traer solo un pollo y un poco de queso?
conversations.contentItalian: Lo vuole cotto, o dovrei portare fuori solo un pollo e un po' di formaggio?
conversations.contentFrench: Voulez-vous cela cuit, ou devrais-je simplement apporter un poulet et du fromage?

conversations.name: Man
conversations.contentEnglish: Ha! You've got a sense of humor. Cooked, please!
conversations.contentSpanish: ¡Ja! Tienes sentido del humor. ¡Cocido, por favor!
conversations.contentItalian: Ah! Hai senso dell'umorismo. Cotto, per favore!
conversations.contentFrench: Ha ! Vous avez le sens de l'humour. Cuit, s'il vous plaît!

conversations.name: Waitress
conversations.contentEnglish: Of course, sir. Anything else?
conversations.contentSpanish: Por supuesto, señor. ¿Algo más?
conversations.contentItalian: Certo, signore. Qualcos'altro?
conversations.contentFrench: Bien sûr, monsieur. Autre chose?

conversations.name: Man
conversations.contentEnglish: A sense of purpose in life. But for now, the chicken will do.
conversations.contentSpanish: Un sentido de propósito en la vida. Pero por ahora, el pollo estará bien.
conversations.contentItalian: Un senso di scopo nella vita. Ma per ora, il pollo andrà bene.
conversations.contentFrench: Un sens du but dans la vie. Mais pour l'instant, le poulet fera l'affaire.

title: The Cab Ride Conundrum
description: A woman tries to get a cab to a mysterious location, leading to a series of amusing exchanges.

conversations.name: Driver
conversations.contentEnglish: Good day, ma'am. Where can I take you today?
conversations.contentSpanish: Buen día, señora. ¿Adónde puedo llevarla hoy?
conversations.contentItalian: Buona giornata, signora. Dove posso portarla oggi?
conversations.contentFrench: Bonne journée, madame. Où puis-je vous emmener aujourd'hui?

conversations.name: Woman
conversations.contentEnglish: To the end of the rainbow, please!
conversations.contentSpanish: ¡Al final del arcoíris, por favor!
conversations.contentItalian: Alla fine dell'arcobaleno, per favore!
conversations.contentFrench: À la fin de l'arc-en-ciel, s'il vous plaît!

conversations.name: Driver
conversations.contentEnglish: Ha, I'll need some luck for that! Anywhere specific in mind?
conversations.contentSpanish: Ja, ¡necesitaré algo de suerte para eso! ¿Tiene algún lugar específico en mente?
conversations.contentItalian: Ah, avrò bisogno di un po' di fortuna per quello! Hai un posto specifico in mente?
conversations.contentFrench: Ha, j'aurai besoin de chance pour ça! Vous avez un endroit spécifique en tête?

conversations.name: Woman
conversations.contentEnglish: Alright, to the city museum then.
conversations.contentSpanish: Está bien, entonces al museo de la ciudad.
conversations.contentItalian: Va bene, allora al museo della città.
conversations.contentFrench: D'accord, au musée de la ville alors.

conversations.name: Driver
conversations.contentEnglish: Great choice! Do you want to take the scenic route or the fastest one?
conversations.contentSpanish: ¡Buena elección! ¿Quiere tomar la ruta panorámica o la más rápida?
conversations.contentItalian: Ottima scelta! Vuoi prendere la strada panoramica o la più veloce?
conversations.contentFrench: Excellent choix ! Vous voulez prendre la route panoramique ou la plus rapide?

conversations.name: Woman
conversations.contentEnglish: Hmm, which one has more rainbows?
conversations.contentSpanish: Hmm, ¿cuál tiene más arcoíris?
conversations.contentItalian: Hmm, quale ha più arcobaleni?
conversations.contentFrench: Hmm, lequel a le plus d'arc-en-ciels?

conversations.name: Driver
conversations.contentEnglish: I believe the scenic route might fulfill your rainbow desires.
conversations.contentSpanish: Creo que la ruta panorámica podría cumplir sus deseos de arcoíris.
conversations.contentItalian: Credo che la strada panoramica potrebbe soddisfare i tuoi desideri di arcobaleno.
conversations.contentFrench: Je crois que la route panoramique pourrait répondre à vos désirs d'arc-en-ciel.

conversations.name: Woman
conversations.contentEnglish: Splendid! Let's chase some rainbows.
conversations.contentSpanish: ¡Espléndido! Vamos a perseguir algunos arcoíris.
conversations.contentItalian: Splendido! Inseguiamo alcuni arcobaleni.
conversations.contentFrench: Splendide ! Poursuivons quelques arc-en-ciels.

conversations.name: Driver
conversations.contentEnglish: Hold tight! We’re off on a colorful journey.
conversations.contentSpanish: ¡Agárrese fuerte! Nos vamos en un viaje colorido.
conversations.contentItalian: Tieniti forte! Siamo in viaggio in un viaggio colorato.
conversations.contentFrench: Accrochez-vous ! Nous partons pour un voyage haut en couleur.

conversations.name: Woman
conversations.contentEnglish: Do you think we’ll find a pot of gold?
conversations.contentSpanish: ¿Crees que encontraremos una olla de oro?
conversations.contentItalian: Pensi che troveremo una pentola d'oro?
conversations.contentFrench: Pensez-vous que nous trouverons un pot d'or?

conversations.name: Driver
conversations.contentEnglish: Well, ma'am, I can’t promise gold, but I assure you a golden experience!
conversations.contentSpanish: Bueno, señora, no puedo prometerle oro, ¡pero le aseguro una experiencia dorada!
conversations.contentItalian: Bene, signora, non posso prometterti oro, ma ti assicuro un'esperienza dorata!
conversations.contentFrench: Eh bien, madame, je ne peux pas promettre d'or, mais je vous assure une expérience en or !

conversations.name: Woman
conversations.contentEnglish: That will do, Mr. Cab Driver. To the rainbows!
conversations.contentSpanish: Eso servirá, Sr. Taxista. ¡A los arcoíris!
conversations.contentItalian: Andrà bene, Signor Tassista. Agli arcobaleni!
conversations.contentFrench: Ça ira, Monsieur le Chauffeur. Aux arc-en-ciels!

title: The Unexpected Sports Fan
description: Two friends attend a sports game, but one reveals an unexpected side of themselves.

conversations.name: Jake
conversations.contentEnglish: Hey Sarah, thanks for inviting me to this game! I've never watched live baseball before.
conversations.contentSpanish: ¡Hola Sarah, gracias por invitarme a este juego! Nunca he visto béisbol en vivo antes.
conversations.contentItalian: Ehi Sarah, grazie per avermi invitato a questa partita! Non ho mai visto una partita di baseball dal vivo prima.
conversations.contentFrench: Salut Sarah, merci de m'avoir invité à ce match! Je n'ai jamais vu de baseball en direct avant.

conversations.name: Sarah
conversations.contentEnglish: Really? Prepare to get hooked! It's so much better live.
conversations.contentSpanish: ¿En serio? ¡Prepárate para engancharte! Es mucho mejor en vivo.
conversations.contentItalian: Davvero? Preparati a diventare un fan! È molto meglio dal vivo.
conversations.contentFrench: Vraiment ? Prépare-toi à devenir accro ! C'est tellement mieux en direct.

conversations.name: Jake
conversations.contentEnglish: It's just... they just stand there most of the time, right?
conversations.contentSpanish: Es solo que... ellos solo están parados la mayoría del tiempo, ¿verdad?
conversations.contentItalian: È solo che... stanno lì fermi la maggior parte del tempo, giusto?
conversations.contentFrench: C'est juste... ils restent là la plupart du temps, non?

conversations.name: Sarah
conversations.contentEnglish: Oh, just you wait! The excitement is all in the small details.
conversations.contentSpanish: ¡Oh, solo espera! La emoción está en los pequeños detalles.
conversations.contentItalian: Oh, aspetta e vedrai! L'emozione è tutta nei piccoli dettagli.
conversations.contentFrench: Oh, attends un peu ! L'excitation est dans les petits détails.

conversations.name: Jake
conversations.contentEnglish: Well, I did bring my glove. Just in case a ball comes our way.
conversations.contentSpanish: Bueno, traje mi guante. Por si acaso una pelota viene hacia nosotros.
conversations.contentItalian: Beh, ho portato il mio guanto. Nel caso in cui una palla venga nella nostra direzione.
conversations.contentFrench: Eh bien, j'ai apporté mon gant. Au cas où une balle viendrait dans notre direction.

conversations.name: Sarah
conversations.contentEnglish: That's the spirit! Also, did you get a foam finger?
conversations.contentSpanish: ¡Ese es el espíritu! Además, ¿compraste un dedo de espuma?
conversations.contentItalian: Questo è lo spirito! E poi, hai preso un dito di schiuma?
conversations.contentFrench: C'est l'esprit ! Aussi, as-tu pris un doigt en mousse?

conversations.name: Jake
conversations.contentEnglish: I thought that was too cliché?
conversations.contentSpanish: ¿Pensé que eso era muy cliché?
conversations.contentItalian: Pensavo fosse troppo cliché?
conversations.contentFrench: J'ai pensé que c'était trop cliché ?

conversations.name: Sarah
conversations.contentEnglish: No way! It’s all part of the experience. I have an extra one here for you.
conversations.contentSpanish: ¡Para nada! Es parte de la experiencia. Tengo uno extra aquí para ti.
conversations.contentItalian: Ma no! Fa tutto parte dell'esperienza. Ne ho uno in più qui per te.
conversations.contentFrench: Pas du tout ! C'est tout une partie de l'expérience. J'en ai un en plus ici pour toi.

conversations.name: Jake
conversations.contentEnglish: Haha, alright. I'm in! Go team!
conversations.contentSpanish: Jaja, está bien. ¡Estoy dentro! ¡Vamos equipo!
conversations.contentItalian: Haha, va bene. Ci sono! Forza squadra!
conversations.contentFrench: Haha, d'accord. Je suis partant ! Allez l'équipe !

conversations.name: Sarah
conversations.contentEnglish: That's what I wanted to hear! Enjoy the game.
conversations.contentSpanish: ¡Eso es lo que quería escuchar! Disfruta el juego.
conversations.contentItalian: È quello che volevo sentire! Goditi la partita.
conversations.contentFrench: C'est ce que je voulais entendre ! Profite du match.

conversations.name: Jake
conversations.contentEnglish: Thanks, Sarah. With you by my side, I think I just might.
conversations.contentSpanish: Gracias, Sarah. Contigo a mi lado, creo que podría hacerlo.
conversations.contentItalian: Grazie, Sarah. Con te al mio fianco, penso proprio di poterlo fare.
conversations.contentFrench: Merci, Sarah. Avec toi à mes côtés, je pense que je pourrais bien le faire.

conversations.name: Sarah
conversations.contentEnglish: Cheers to new experiences!
conversations.contentSpanish: ¡Brindemos por nuevas experiencias!
conversations.contentItalian: Evviva le nuove esperienze!
conversations.contentFrench: À de nouvelles expériences !
